languages.text: "А ты предпочтешь, чтобы десятина продолжила гнить? Это все равно что уничтожить ее. По праву держател{mf|я|ьницы} священного Патента, я забираю всю подать, и мое решение окончательное".
"Would you rather see the tithe rot? That would be tantamount to destroying it. By the right of the sacred Warrant of Trade, I claim the entire tithe for myself. My decision stands."
languages.original_text: "А ты предпочтешь, чтобы десятина продолжила гнить? Это все равно что уничтожить ее. По праву держател{mf|я|ьницы} священного Патента, я забираю всю подать, и мое решение окончательное".

traits.locale_text: "Would you rather see the tithe rot? That would be the same as destroying it. By the right of the sacred Warrant of Trade, I claim the entire tithe, and my decision stands."
"Would you rather see the tithe rot? That would be the same as destroying it. By the right of the sacred Warrant of Trade, I claim the entire tithe, and my decision stands."
"Would you rather see the tithe rot? That would be tantamount to destroying it. By the right of the sacred Warrant of Trade, I claim the entire tithe for myself. My decision stands."
"Would you rather see the tithe rot? That would be tantamount to destroying it. By the right of the sacred Warrant of Trade, I claim the entire tithe for myself. My decision stands."
"Would you rather see the tithe rot? That would be tantamount to destroying it. By the right of the sacred Warrant of Trade, I claim the entire tithe for myself. My decision stands."
"Would you rather see the tithe rot? That would be tantamount to destroying it. By the right of the sacred Warrant of Trade, I claim the entire tithe for myself. My decision stands."

languages.text: "Wollt Ihr den Zehnt lieber verrotten lassen? Das wäre gleichbedeutend mit seiner Zerstörung. Im Namen des heiligen Handelsbriefs beanspruche ich den gesamten Zehnt für mich. Meine Entscheidung steht fest."
languages.original_text: "Would you rather see the tithe rot? That would be tantamount to destroying it. By the right of the sacred Warrant of Trade, I claim the entire tithe for myself. My decision stands."

traits.locale_text: "Wollt Ihr den Zehnt lieber verrotten lassen? Das wäre gleichbedeutend mit seiner Zerstörung. Im Namen des heiligen Handelsbriefs beanspruche ich den gesamten Zehnt für mich. Meine Entscheidung steht fest."

languages.text: « Préféreriez-vous laisser la dîme se perdre ? Cela équivaudrait à la détruire. Par le droit que me confère la lettre de marque sacrée, je m'approprie l'intégralité de la dîme. Ma décision est irrévocable. »
languages.original_text: "Would you rather see the tithe rot? That would be tantamount to destroying it. By the right of the sacred Warrant of Trade, I claim the entire tithe for myself. My decision stands."

traits.locale_text: « Préféreriez-vous laisser la dîme se perdre ? Cela équivaudrait à la détruire. Par le droit que me confère la lettre de marque sacrée, je m'approprie l'intégralité de la dîme. Ma décision est irrévocable. »

languages.text: “难道你宁愿看着什一税烂掉吗？那和毁了它没有任何区别。根据神圣贸易授状赋予的权力，我有权命令所有什一税归我所有。我的决定就是最终决定。”
languages.original_text: "Would you rather see the tithe rot? That would be tantamount to destroying it. By the right of the sacred Warrant of Trade, I claim the entire tithe for myself. My decision stands."

traits.locale_text: “难道你宁愿看着什一税烂掉吗？那和毁了它没有任何区别。根据神圣贸易授状赋予的权力，我有权命令所有什一税归我所有。我的决定就是最终决定。”

languages.text: «¿Prefiere que el diezmo se pudra? Eso sería lo mismo que destruirlo. Por derecho de la sagrada Patente de Comercio, me quedaré con la totalidad del diezmo. Mi decisión es firme».
languages.original_text: "Would you rather see the tithe rot? That would be tantamount to destroying it. By the right of the sacred Warrant of Trade, I claim the entire tithe for myself. My decision stands."

traits.locale_text: «¿Prefiere que el diezmo se pudra? Eso sería lo mismo que destruirlo. Por derecho de la sagrada Patente de Comercio, me quedaré con la totalidad del diezmo. Mi decisión es firme».

languages.text: 「租税が腐るのを指をくわえて見ている気か？それでは破壊するのと同じだ。聖なる通商令状の権利により、この租税のすべてを自分のものと主張する。{mf|俺|私}の決定は揺るがない」
languages.original_text: "Would you rather see the tithe rot? That would be tantamount to destroying it. By the right of the sacred Warrant of Trade, I claim the entire tithe for myself. My decision stands."

traits.locale_text: 「租税が腐るのを指をくわえて見ている気か？それでは破壊するのと同じだ。聖なる通商令状の権利により、この租税のすべてを自分のものと主張する。{mf|俺|私}の決定は揺るがない」

languages.text: "Aşarın çürüyüp gitmesini mi tercih edersin? Yok etsek de aynı şey. Kutsal Ticari Ruhsatname'nin verdiği hakla aşarın tamamını kendime istiyorum. Kararım kesindir."
languages.original_text: "Would you rather see the tithe rot? That would be tantamount to destroying it. By the right of the sacred Warrant of Trade, I claim the entire tithe for myself. My decision stands."

traits.locale_text: "Aşarın çürüyüp gitmesini mi tercih edersin? Yok etsek de aynı şey. Kutsal Ticari Ruhsatname'nin verdiği hakla aşarın tamamını kendime istiyorum. Kararım kesindir."
